Item.name: Diving Suit Locker
Item.description: Storage for one diving suit, refills oxygen if powered. ( Place by pressing aim + use )

Item.name: Oxygen Tank Shelf
Item.description: Storage for three oxygen tanks, refills oxygen if powered. ( Place by pressing aim + use )

Item.name: Water Sprinkler
Item.description: A general-purpose sprinkler system for agricultural use or light fire suppression. Requires electricity. ( Place by pressing aim + use )

Item.name: Junction Bus
Item.description: A simple wall mounted electrical junction. ( Place by pressing aim + use )

Item.name: Heavy Power Switch
Item.description: An industrial-strength power disconnect, capable of handling a single-pin throughput of up to 5000kw. ( Place by pressing aim + use )

Item.name: Battery Assembly
Item.description: Wall mounted heavy battery power stack. 2000kw capacity, 1500kw discharge rate. ( Place by pressing aim + use )

Item.name: Fabricator
Item.description: A machine capable of manufacturing a wide range of items out of basic raw materials. ( Place by pressing aim + use )

Item.name: Medical Fabricator
Item.description: A machine that can be used to manufacture various medicines. ( Place by pressing aim + use )

Item.name: Deconstructor
Item.description: Disassembles and breaks down items to reusable components and material bars. ( Place by pressing aim + use )

Item.name: Sonar Monitor
Item.description: Usable device for observing the sub's sonar. ( Place by pressing aim + use )

Item.name: Status Monitor
Item.description: Usable device for viewing a schematic of the sub as well as the status of each room. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
